review.reviewBody: Best Fried Chicken around. The Sweet & Savory Pancake is delicious but you'll need a friend to share it with - the portion is enormous
I love how unique each of their dishes are. That really makes this place special. The pancakes are massive. One pancake is more than enough, two is too much for one person!
Very well packaged and very well cooked. Had a huge order and it came quick and everything was perfectly cooked.
Consistently delicious, hot, and they never forget anything. Best breakfast/brunch place to order from in Langley !!
Delhi cafe does not miss a beat! Incredible menu and amazing flavour profiles!
